summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6691 for the improvement of 8th Avenue Northwest from Northwest 120th Street to approximately 150 feet north of Northwest 132nd Street; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys; by constructing underground utilities lines and a residential street lighting system; under Ordinance 106632, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and amending Ordinance 106632, Section 4, revising the interest limit on the local Improvement Bonds.
